text: Ok food , decoration is very casual, could be better . Quick and friendly service . Masala tea is disappointing. Dosa is ok .

I've been here 3 times now and I really appreciate the girl I've been dealing with. I never caught her name but I believe she's the daughter of the owner. She takes a real interest in the business and truly cares for the customers.

This is a family business here in Bradford and one which I plan to continue supporting. Keep up the good work

Excellent food! The Dosa's are great (especially the spicy Kara Dosa). I've had almost everything on the menu and I can honestly say I've never been disappointed. Some of my favorites would be the mutton briyani, the Kara dosa, and the masala tea.
